purpose: Illustrate collaboration between financial institutions and digital giants.
title: Leveraging existing platforms with digital giants

tables.title: Amazon Rewards Chase Card
tables.description: Details of the partnership between Chase and Amazon.

cells: Issues cobrand credit cards - Amazon Rewards Visa Signature, Amazon Prime Rewards Visa Signature
Offers rewards for Chase members (including non-Amazon card holders)
Promotes Prime membership, Amazon & Whole Foods purchases with generous cashbacks
Indirect promotion of Chase to its more than 100M Prime members

tables.title: Square Cash Card
tables.description: Details of the partnership between Sutton Bank and Square.

cells: Sutton Bank: issues Square Cash debit card, enabling omnichannel use
Provides banks access to more than 7M active customers (2018)
LSB: provides users with an account and routing number for direct deposits
Doesn't require banks to provide consumer banking services
